Posts.Content: Definitely wear loose clothing. I wore jeans once and they got tighter and tighter as the day went on due to fluid retention.  I found it a bit like being on a long haul flight, very boring and the last couple of hours just drag on and on! All will be fine. Best wishes, Diana x
